meta.title: About — DCIMAL
meta.description: DCIMAL is a digital transformation company empowering enterprises across 15+ countries with cloud, AI, and enterprise solutions.

mission.label: Mission
mission.text: Empower organizations with digital solutions that drive sustainable growth and competitive advantage.

vision.label: Vision
vision.text: Be the global leader in digital transformation — recognized for expertise that seamlessly integrates with business strategy.

items.brief: We embrace cutting-edge technology to solve hard problems.
Your success is our success — we build lasting relationships.
Every deliverable meets the highest standard of quality.
We move fast, adapt quickly, and deliver iteratively.

items.event: Founded in India with a team of 5 engineers.
First enterprise client — cloud migration for a fintech startup.
Expanded into AI & Data Science practice.
ServiceNow and SAP BTP capabilities launched.
